Last night, I had the pleasure of attending the inaugural ceremony of a new Indian and Chinese cuisine @zaitoon_family restaurant, and I must say, it was an absolute delight for my taste buds! The ambience was warm and inviting, and the staff was incredibly friendly and accommodating, making the entire experience even more enjoyable.

As for the food, where do I even begin? The fish was cooked to perfection, with a crispy outer layer and a tender, juicy inside. It was seasoned just right, with the perfect amount of spices to bring out the flavour without overwhelming the dish. I was blown away by how delicious it was, and I couldn't help but go back for seconds.

But the fish was just the beginning. The salads were equally impressive, with a variety of fresh, colourful vegetables and a tangy dressing that complemented the flavours perfectly. I particularly enjoyed the mix of crunchy textures and the burst of flavours in every bite.

Overall, I was thoroughly impressed with the quality and variety of dishes offered at this restaurant. It's clear that the chefs have a deep understanding of traditional Indian and Chinese cuisine, and they've managed to create a menu that showcases the best of both worlds.

If you're a foodie like me, I highly recommend giving this restaurant a try. I promise you won't be disappointed!

"Mangoes hain to phir aur kya chahye????"

Nesto Mango Fest is an annual event that celebrates the delicious and juicy mango fruit in all its glory. This festival is organized by Nesto Hypermarkets, a popular chain of retail stores in the Middle East, and takes place during the peak mango season.

The Nesto Mango Fest features a wide variety of mangoes from different parts of the world, including India, Pakistan, Thailand, and the Philippines. Visitors can sample and purchase fresh mangoes, as well as mango-based products such as mango juice, mango ice cream, and mango jam.

In addition to the delicious food and drink offerings, the Nesto Mango Fest also features fun activities and entertainment for the whole family. There are games, contests, and live performances by local artists and musicians. Visitors can also attend cooking demonstrations and learn how to make their own mango-based dishes at home.

The Nesto Mango Fest is a great opportunity to indulge in one of the world's most beloved fruits and to celebrate the diversity of cultures and cuisines that make up the Middle East. If you're a mango lover, be sure to mark your calendar for the next Nesto Mango Fest and join in the fun! 

#mavenshub #nestohypermarket #mango #NestoMangoFest #MangoSeason #MangoLoversUnite #MiddleEastFestivals #MangoMania

Looking for authentic Indian street food? Look no further than @mohallarestaurant located in the heart of The Espelende! Their menu is packed with mouthwatering and delicious dishes that will transport your taste buds straight to the streets of India.

But it's not just about street food - their menu also features classic Indian dishes like Biryani and Butter Chicken with Butter Naan. Trust us, you won't be disappointed! 

visit them and experience the best of Indian cuisine in The Espelende.

Are you a food lover who wants to discover new flavors, products, and trends in the F&B industry? Do you want to meet and network with leading experts, chefs, and exhibitors from around the world? If yes, then you should not miss the Saudi Food Show 2023, the biggest food show ever in Saudi Arabia!

The Saudi Food Show 2023 is a three-day event that will take place in Riyadh from 20 to 22 June 2023 at The Riyadh International Convention & Exhibition Centre. It is a unique opportunity to explore the latest innovations and developments in the F&B sector, as well as to learn from the best practices and insights of industry leaders and influencers.

The Saudi Food Show 2023 will feature more than 50,000 global F&B brands from over 100 countries, including the UK, Uruguay, the Netherlands, and Singapore. You will be able to see, taste, and experience a wide range of products and services, such as halal food, organic food, bakery and confectionery, beverages, dairy products, frozen food, meat and poultry, seafood, snacks, spices and condiments, and much more.

The Saudi Food Show 2023 will also host a series of workshops, seminars, panel discussions, and live demonstrations led by key strategic players and experts from various fields, such as government and ministerial bodies, industrial development authorities, food safety agencies, investment funds, culinary academies, media outlets, and technology providers. You will be able to gain exclusive market access insights, learn about the latest trends and challenges in the F&B industry, and discover new opportunities for growth and collaboration.

The Saudi Food Show 2023 is the perfect platform to celebrate the diversity and richness of the F&B industry in Saudi Arabia and beyond. It is a must-attend event for anyone who wants to be part of the new food economy and witness the transformation of the F&B sector in the Kingdom.

Don’t miss this chance to join a momentous occasion in the history of Saudi Arabia. Register now and be part of the Saudi Food Show 2023!

location.city_name: The Lost Paradise of Dilmun Water Park

social_posts.post_text:
I had a great time at the **Lost Paradise of Dilmun** water park in Bahrain. It is the biggest water park in the country and has many exciting rides and attractions for all ages. The park is open from **10 am to 7 pm** on weekdays and from **10 am to 8 pm** on weekends. The night access ticket costs **BD 6** and allows you to enjoy the park from **4 pm to 7 pm** on weekdays and from **5 pm to 8 pm** on weekends.

One of the highlights of the park is the **ladies night** every Thursday from **7 pm to 1 am**. This is a special event where only women and children under 13 years old are allowed to enter the park. The ladies night ticket costs **BD 10** and includes access to all the rides, a DJ, live entertainment, food stalls, and a free gift. The park is very safe and secure during ladies night and the staff are very friendly and helpful.

I would recommend the Lost Paradise of Dilmun to anyone who loves water parks and wants to have a fun and relaxing day with family or friends. It is a great place to escape the heat and enjoy some thrilling rides. The park is very clean and well-maintained and has something for everyone.

#mavenshub #LostParadiseOfDilmun #Bahrain #WaterPark #LadiesNight #Fun #review #water #swimming

I had a wonderful stay at Asdal Gulf Inn Hotel Bahrain with my family. We live in  their Family Suite, which was spacious, comfortable, and luxurious. The suite had two bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, a large living room, a dining area, and three TVs with cable channels. The beds were cozy, and the bathrooms were clean and well-equipped. The suite also had a beautiful view of the city.

The hotel is located in the Seef district of Manama, which is a great area for shopping and entertainment. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to the nearby Seef Mall and Bahrain City Centre, where we found many shops, restaurants, and attractions. The hotel also has its own dining options, such as the Gallery restaurant, which serves a buffet breakfast and international cuisine, which offers an Asian experience, and the 1664 Lounge, which is a cozy place to enjoy drinks and snacks while watching sports.

The hotel also has a rooftop pool and a mini gym, where we could relax and unwind after a busy day. The pool was clean and refreshing, and the gym had modern equipment and facilities. The staff at the hotel were friendly and helpful, and they made us feel welcome and pampered.

The cost of the Family Suite was reasonable for the quality and service we received. The cost is 99 BHD per night, which included taxes and fees.

 You will also get a special offer of 10% off on food, bar access and beverages at the hotel's outlets.

 I felt that it was a great value for money, and i would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a family-friendly accommodation in Bahrain.

Thank you so much @asdalgulfinn for making my stay cation more beautiful and memorable with your services 💕

I'm so excited to share with you my experience with the Ring security camera, one of the best home security systems on the market.

The Ring security camera is a smart device that lets you monitor your home from anywhere, with live video, motion alerts, two-way talk, and more. It's easy to install, works with Alexa, and comes with a Ring Protect subscription that lets you save and share your videos.

The box contains everything you need to set up your camera in minutes. Here's what's inside:

- The Ring security camera itself, which is sleek and compact, with a black or white finish. It has a wide-angle lens, a built-in microphone and speaker, a LED ring that indicates the status, and a privacy cover that you can slide to block the camera when you want.

- A power adapter and a micro-USB cable that you can use to plug in your camera to any standard outlet. You can also use batteries or solar panels (sold separately) to power your camera wirelessly.

- A mounting base and screws that you can use to attach your camera to any flat surface, indoors or outdoors. You can adjust the angle of your camera by rotating the base or tilting the camera.

- A quick start guide and a security sticker that you can use to let others know that your home is protected by Ring.

I'm glad you asked me to write a review about the new tikka dishes that Mish Grill has introduced. Here is what I came up with:

Mish Grill is a restaurant that specializes in grilled dishes with a touch of Indian spices. They have recently launched some new tikka dishes that are worth trying. Tikka is a dish of small pieces of meat or vegetables marinated in a yogurt-based sauce and grilled on skewers. Mish Grill offers a variety of tikka dishes, such as:

- Tikka Biriyani Bowl: This is a rice dish that combines grilled chicken tikka with aromatic basmati rice cooked with saffron, cardamom, and other spices. - Tandoori Kebab: This is a meat lover's delight that features grilled lamb and beef kebabs marinated in a tandoori spice mix. The kebabs are moist and flavorful, and the spice mix has a balanced blend of heat and herbs. This dish is served with naan bread, salad, and chutney. 

-Tikka Roll
- Tikka Burger
- Tikka Fries

If you are looking for a satisfying and delicious meal, you should definitely try the new tikka dishes at Mish Grill. They are sure to please your taste buds and make you feel like you are in India. You can order online from their website or visit their restaurant in Dubai.

I visited Dave's Hot Chicken for the first time yesterday and I was pleasantly surprised by their delicious food and friendly service. The branch is located in Yahlia Street, Riyadh. It has a spacious and cozy interior, with a modern and colorful design. The staff were very welcoming and helpful, and they explained the menu and the different spice levels to me.

I ordered the 10 pcs chicken tenders with fries and refill coke, which are very reasonable in price. I would definitely recommend Dave's Hot Chicken to anyone who loves fried chicken and spicy food. It is one of the best places to eat in Riyadh, and I can't wait to go back and try their other dishes. Dave's Hot Chicken is a must-try for all foodies!

Mohalla is a casual Indian street food restaurant located in The Esplanade Mall in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The restaurant is known for its bold flavors and dishes inspired by different regions of India.

If you’re looking for a quick bite, you might want to try their Wada Pav. It’s a popular street food snack in Mumbai, consisting of a deep-fried potato dumpling served in a bread roll. Another popular dish is the Sikh Kebab Naan Wich, which is a sandwich made with kebab, naan bread, and chutney.

If you’re in the mood for something refreshing, you might want to try their Classic Mojito. It’s a minty cocktail made with rum, lime juice, sugar, soda water, and fresh mint leaves.

For something spicy, you might want to try their Chicken Chilli. It’s a Chinese-inspired dish made with chicken, bell peppers, onions, and a spicy sauce.

If you’re looking for something unique, you might want to try their Raj Kachori. It’s a popular chaat dish from North India, consisting of a crispy fried shell filled with potatoes, chickpeas, and a variety of chutneys and spices.

Finally, if you’re in the mood for something sweet, you might want to try their Karak Chai. It’s a popular tea from the Middle East, made with black tea, milk, sugar, and spices.

Enjoy the classic flavors of street food
Enjoy your meal at Mohalla!

Prison Island, located on the first floor of Riyadh Park Mall, is an indoor attraction that offers a unique and exciting experience for people of all ages.
